app_description.title: Geo Bubble Whispers - Location-Based Social Messages
app_description.subtitle: Share messages and stories with people around you
app_description.description:
Discover and share location-based messages in your neighborhood. Geo Bubble Whispers lets you:

üó∫Ô∏è Place messages on an interactive map
üìç See what people are saying in your area
üì± Share photos, videos, and live streams
üë• Connect with your local community
üîí Control your privacy with public and private messages
üìñ Create and view stories from nearby locations

Whether you're looking to meet new people, share local events, or just see what's happening around you, Geo Bubble Whispers brings your neighborhood to life through location-based social interaction.

Key Features:
‚Ä¢ Interactive Google Maps integration
‚Ä¢ Real-time messaging and notifications
‚Ä¢ Photo and video sharing
‚Ä¢ Live streaming capabilities
‚Ä¢ Story creation and viewing
‚Ä¢ Privacy controls
‚Ä¢ User profiles and authentication
‚Ä¢ Street View integration
‚Ä¢ Filter messages by type and privacy

Join your local community today and start discovering the stories around you!

app_store_info.promotional_text: Connect with your neighborhood through location-based messages and stories!

review_info.notes: This app uses location services to provide location-based messaging functionality. Users can place messages on a map and see messages from other users in their vicinity. The app includes privacy controls allowing users to make messages public or private.
